comment._content:
Thanks -- we think it's a wonderful gem in our collection! For another view, check out this image from Paul Vernon Photography (ca. 1917).

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/paulvernonphoto/2577183524/]

It's also interesting to compare these images to current shots (thanks to Jason Schilling for this one).
